t: This Is Why You Should Never Buy Costco’s Kirkland Products on Amazon
s: March 7, 2025 - While you will find legit Kirkland ... with brands to grow their e-commerce businesses. And that’s where the potential problems arise. Here’s why buying Kirkland products on Amazon is such an iffy proposition: The whole point of Costco is to save money, but if you buy Kirkland products on Amazon, there’s a good chance you’ll be negating those savings. In fact, there can be anywhere from a 12% to 75% markup on them! Case in point: You can buy Kirkland Unsalted Extra Fancy Mixed Nuts on Amazon ...
